gw.bizrules

Class BizRulesComponentMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.BizRulesComponentMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.dependency.Startable

    public class BizRulesComponentMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.dependency.Startable
    Component registration & cache implementation. Implements functionality mapping rule components to one another and to their keys.
